title: NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Head Posts
description: The National Highways InvIT Project Managers Private Limited (NHIPMPL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Head Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit...
